message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $1000000. It's a unique opportunity to get a head start on the market, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased similar products.
I'll take it, but only because I'm curious to see if it's high quality or not. I'm not expecting it to be worth the price, but I'm willing to take the risk.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous product! As for this next one, I want to emphasize its durability and long-lasting features. I've had several customers use similar products for years without any issues. Plus, I'm offering it to you for the same price of $1000000. It's a great value, if I do say so myself!
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm not convinced that this product is worth the price. I'd like to see more information about its actual quality before making a decision.

I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. Your confidence in the product's quality doesn't necessarily translate to its actual value to me. I'd like to see more evidence or at least a lower price before making a decision.
